sourcesContent:
<template>
 <jalaliCalendar :eventsList="events" :vacationsList="vacations" disablePastDays addEventButton @dayClick="showEventModal" @on-event-click="showEventModal" />
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, defineAsyncComponent } from 'vue'
import moment from 'jalali-moment'
const jalaliCalendar = defineAsyncComponent(() =>
  import('vue3-jalali-calendar').then(mod => mod.jalaliCalendar)
)
const showEventModal = (e) => {
  console.log('کلیک شد:', e)
  alert('check your log')
}

const events = ref([
  {
    startDateTime: moment("2025-06-20T13:37:41.020+00:00"),
    endDateTime: moment("2025-06-27T20:49:41.020+00:00"),
    title: "رویداد شماره ۱",
    id:1,
    color: "#29B6F6",
  },
  {
    startDateTime: moment("2025-06-20T13:37:41.020+00:00"),
    endDateTime: moment("2025-06-27T20:49:41.020+00:00"),
    title: "رویداد شماره 3",
    id:2,
    color: "#2946F6",
  },
  {
    startDateTime: moment("2025-06-20T13:37:41.020+00:00"),
    endDateTime: moment("2025-06-27T20:49:41.020+00:00"),
    title: "رویداد شماره 3",
    id:3,
    color: "#29B1F6",
  }
])

const vacations = ref([
  {
    date: moment("1404/04/10", "jYYYY/jMM/jDD"),
    title: "روز طبیعت",
  }
])
</script>

<style>
  #persian-calendar #vpc_calendar .vpc_week .vpc_day.vpc_week-period-day , #persian-calendar #vpc_calendar .vpc_week .vpc_day{
    min-height: 50px !important;        
  }
  @media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
    #persian-calendar #vpc_header #vpc_date-control .vpc_now-date {
      margin: auto 5px;
      width: 140px;
    }
    #persian-calendar #vpc_header {
      padding: 20px 5px;
    }
    #persian-calendar #vpc_header #vpc_date-control .vpc_today-btn {
      margin: 0 5px;
    }
  }
</style>
